name: "Jump" Not Found
description:
The game is free however you can donate to speed up the development :)

Aproximate play time ~ 10-15 minutes

10 Levels, 3 bullets for each, multiple enemies and multiples doors to unlock. Try to solve these puzzle-platformer levels as efficient as possible and remember, you don't need to kill all enemies ;)

Controls:

- [A] and [D] - move left and right

- [K] or mouse left click to shoot

- Escape [Esc] to pause the game
